title: Escape From Texas, The Very Weird Frasier Reboot 7.14.21
itunes:title: Escape From Texas, The Very Weird Frasier Reboot 7.14.21
description:
In episode 950, Jack and Miles are joined by The Worst Idea Of All Time Podcast co-host Tim Batt to discuss voter suppression in Texas, Newsmax fantasizing Trump as Batman, the Frasier reboot, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Texas Democrat on governor's threat: 'I have not committed a crime, so I can't get arrested'
  2. Texas House Democrats flee the state in move that could block voting restrictions bill, bring Legislature to a halt
  3. BREAKING: Trump Nothing Like Batman
  4. Kelsey Grammer says ‘Frasier’ reboot may not include original cast
  5. Frasier star addresses return of original cast members for reboot
  6. Frasier Reboot Isn't Based in Seattle
  7. Kelsey Grammer Back As Dr. Frasier Crane As Paramount+ Confirms ‘Frasier’ Reboot
  8. Partners: Grammer and Lawrence break first law of sitcoms – be funny
  9. Hank - "Pilot"
  10. From Gossip Girl to Frasier to Sex and the City: are reboots driven by nostalgia – or desperation?
  11. Kelsey Grammer Defends His Support For Donald Trump
  12. Infinity culture war: what now for Trump's Hollywood supporters?
  13. Kelsey Grammer: My Republican Views Cost Me Emmy Nomination
  14. Kelsey Grammer’s pro-Trump politics risk tarnishing the Frasier reboot
  15. And Just Like That’s First-Look Image Makes Us Feel Samantha’s Absence
  16. The 'Fuller House' Cast Wants To Come Back For Another Reboot In 10 Years
  17. LISTEN: Sofia Kourtesis - 'By Your Side' (Official Audio)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
